metadata.note: このファイルは原作7巻に登場する重要な魔法の概念の下書きです。日本語翻訳と詳細情報を追加済み。

data.description_en: Magic used for malevolent purposes, including curses, hexes, and dark spells
data.description_ja: 呪い、妨害呪文、闇の呪文など悪意ある目的で使われる魔法
data.characteristics: Harmful, often illegal, corrupts the user; studied in Defense Against the Dark Arts
data.requirements: Often requires malicious intent; some spells are Unforgivable
data.effects: Causes harm, controls minds, kills; corrupts the caster
data.limitations: Illegal in most contexts; can be defended against with proper training
data.book_appearances: PS, COS, POA, GOF, OOTF, HBP, DH
data.significance: Central threat in series; studied to defend against; Voldemort's specialty
data.key_examples: Unforgivable Curses, Dark Mark, Horcruxes
data.note: Book 1-7: Magic used for malevolent purposes
data.tweet_text_ja: 【闇の魔術】呪い、妨害呪文など悪意ある目的で使われる魔法の総称。許されざる呪文、闇の印、分霊箱などが含まれます。ほとんどの場合違法です。ホグワーツでは闇の魔術に対する防衛術として学びます。

data.description_en: Object containing a fragment of a wizard's soul, achieved through murder
data.description_ja: 魔法使いの魂の一部を封じ込めた物体で、殺人によって作られる
data.characteristics: Grants immortality; corrupts those near it; extremely dark magic
data.requirements: Committing murder to split the soul; advanced dark magic ritual
data.effects: Creator cannot die while Horcruxes exist; soul becomes unstable
data.limitations: Can be destroyed by powerful magic (Basilisk venom, Fiendfyre); making them damages soul irreparably
data.significance: Key to Voldemort's immortality; destroying them is central quest in Book 7
data.key_examples: Tom Riddle's diary, Marvolo Gaunt's ring, Slytherin's locket, Hufflepuff's cup, Ravenclaw's diadem, Nagini, Harry Potter
data.note: Book 2,6-7: Object containing a fragment of a wizard's soul, achieved through murder
data.tweet_text_ja: 【分霊箱】魔法使いの魂の一部を封じ込めた物体。殺人によって魂を引き裂き作られます。分霊箱が存在する限り作成者は死ねませんが、魂は不安定になります。ヴォルデモートは7つの分霊箱を作り、それを破壊することが7巻の中心となりました。

data.description_en: Three most powerful and sinister Dark spells that are illegal to use
data.description_ja: 使用が違法とされる最も強力で邪悪な三つの闇の呪文
data.characteristics: Require genuine malicious intent; use results in life sentence in Azkaban
data.requirements: Strong magical power and true desire to cause harm
data.effects: Killing Curse (instant death), Cruciatus Curse (torture), Imperius Curse (mind control)
data.limitations: Can be resisted with strong will (Imperius); require intent to work properly
data.significance: Ultimate illegal magic; Voldemort and Death Eaters' signature spells; Harry learns to resist
data.key_examples: Avada Kedavra (Killing), Crucio (Cruciatus), Imperio (Imperius)
data.note: Book 4-7: Three most powerful and sinister Dark spells (Killing, Cruciatus, Imperius)
data.tweet_text_ja: 【許されざる呪文】使用するとアズカバン終身刑となる三つの闇の呪文。死の呪い（アバダ・ケダブラ）、磔の呪い（クルーシオ）、服従の呪い（インペリオ）。本物の悪意が必要で、ヴォルデモートと死喰い人の代表的な呪文です。

data.description_en: Prediction of future events made by a true Seer
data.description_ja: 真の予見者によってなされる未来の出来事の予測
data.characteristics: Rare; stored in Department of Mysteries; only those mentioned can retrieve them
data.requirements: Must be made by a true Seer in trance-like state
data.effects: Predicts future events; can become self-fulfilling if acted upon
data.limitations: Subject to interpretation; choices can alter how prophecy is fulfilled
data.significance: Prophecy about Harry and Voldemort drives entire series; stored in Ministry
data.key_examples: Harry and Voldemort prophecy made by Trelawney
data.note: Book 3,5-6: Prediction of future events, particularly Harry and Voldemort's prophecy
data.tweet_text_ja: 【予言】真の予見者がトランス状態で語る未来の予測。魔法省の神秘部に保管され、言及された者のみが取り出せます。トレローニー先生が語ったハリーとヴォルデモートの予言がシリーズ全体を動かしました。選択によって成就の仕方が変わります。

data.name_ja: 三大魔法学校対抗試合
data.description_en: Dangerous magical competition between three European wizarding schools
data.description_ja: ヨーロッパの三つの魔法学校間で行われる危険な魔法の競技
data.characteristics: Three tasks; one champion per school (age 17+); binding magical contract
data.requirements: Selected by Goblet of Fire; must be 17 or older
data.effects: Tests magical ability, courage, and intelligence; historically many deaths
data.limitations: Discontinued for centuries due to death toll; reinstated in Book 4 with safety measures
data.significance: Central event of Book 4; used by Voldemort to capture Harry; Cedric's death
data.key_examples: Three tasks: dragons, underwater rescue, maze with Triwizard Cup
data.note: Book 4: Dangerous magical competition between three wizarding schools
data.tweet_text_ja: 【三大魔法学校対抗試合】ホグワーツ、ボーバトン、ダームストラングの三校が競う魔法の競技大会。炎のゴブレットが各校の代表を選び、三つの課題に挑みます。死者が多く長年中止されていましたが、4巻で再開されました。

data.description_en: The fundamental supernatural force in the wizarding world
data.description_ja: 魔法界の根本的な超自然の力
data.characteristics: Inborn ability in witches and wizards; requires wand (usually) and intent
data.requirements: Magical heritage (though some Muggle-borns inherit it); training to control
data.effects: Allows manipulation of reality, transformation, creation, and destruction
data.limitations: Cannot bring back the dead, create food from nothing, or break certain magical laws
data.book_appearances: PS, COS, POA, GOF, OOTF, HBP, DH
data.significance: Foundation of entire series; distinguishes wizarding world from Muggle world
data.key_examples: Charms, Transfiguration, Potions, Defense Against Dark Arts
data.note: Book 1-7: The fundamental force in the wizarding world
data.tweet_text_ja: 【魔法】魔法界の根本的な超自然の力。魔女や魔法使いに生まれつき備わった能力で、通常は杖と意志を必要とします。現実の操作、変身、創造、破壊が可能ですが、死者の蘇生や無からの食物創造など一部の魔法の法則は破れません。

data.description_en: Three legendary magical objects: Elder Wand, Resurrection Stone, Cloak of Invisibility
data.description_ja: 三つの伝説的な魔法の道具：ニワトコの杖、蘇りの石、透明マント
data.characteristics: Said to make possessor Master of Death; extremely rare and powerful
data.requirements: No specific requirements; objects passed down through generations
data.effects: Elder Wand (unbeatable), Resurrection Stone (summons dead), Cloak (perfect invisibility)
data.limitations: Legend says united they conquer death, but reality is more nuanced
data.significance: Central to Book 7; Harry inherits all three; chooses not to pursue them for power
data.key_examples: The Tale of the Three Brothers (Beedle the Bard)
data.note: Book 7: Three legendary magical objects (Elder Wand, Resurrection Stone, Cloak of Invisibility)
data.tweet_text_ja: 【死の秘宝】三つの伝説的な魔法の道具。ニワトコの杖（無敵の杖）、蘇りの石（死者を呼ぶ石）、透明マント（完璧な透明性）。三つ揃えると死を制する者になるとされます。ハリーは全てを継承しましたが、力のために求めませんでした。

data.name_ja: 闇の魔術に対する防衛術
data.description_en: Hogwarts subject teaching defensive magic against Dark creatures and spells
data.description_ja: 闇の生物や呪文から身を守る防衛魔術を教えるホグワーツの科目
data.characteristics: Core subject; cursed position (teachers never last more than a year)
data.requirements: Required for all students; O.W.L. and N.E.W.T. examinations
data.effects: Teaches students to defend against Dark Arts, creatures, and spells
data.limitations: Position cursed by Voldemort after being denied the job
data.book_appearances: PS, COS, POA, GOF, OOTF, HBP, DH
data.significance: Harry's best subject; various teachers each year; curse broken after Voldemort's death
data.key_examples: Patronus Charm, Shield Charm, recognizing Dark creatures
data.note: Book 1-7: Study of defensive magic against Dark Arts
data.tweet_text_ja: 【闇の魔術に対する防衛術】闇の生物や呪文から身を守る方法を教えるホグワーツの必修科目。ヴォルデモートが教職を拒否されて呪いをかけたため、教師は1年以上続きませんでした。守護霊の呪文や盾の呪文などを学びます。ハリーの得意科目です。

data.description_en: The language of snakes, rare ability associated with Salazar Slytherin
data.description_ja: サラザール・スリザリンに関連する稀な能力で、蛇の言語
data.characteristics: Very rare; often hereditary; associated with Dark wizards but not inherently evil
data.requirements: Usually inherited; Harry gained it from Voldemort
data.effects: Allows communication with snakes; can open certain magical locks
data.limitations: Often viewed with suspicion; Harry loses ability after Voldemort's death
data.significance: Opens Chamber of Secrets; proves Harry's connection to Voldemort; social stigma
data.key_examples: Opening Chamber of Secrets, communicating with Nagini
data.note: Book 2-7: The language of snakes, rare ability associated with Salazar Slytherin
data.tweet_text_ja: 【蛇語】蛇と会話できる稀な能力。サラザール・スリザリンに関連し、通常は遺伝します。ハリーはヴォルデモートから受け継ぎました。秘密の部屋を開けたり、ナギニと会話したりできましたが、ヴォルデモートの死後この能力を失いました。

data.description_en: The most powerful form of magic, providing ultimate protection
data.description_ja: 最も強力な魔法の形態で、究極の保護を提供する
data.characteristics: Cannot be manufactured; ancient and powerful magic; Voldemort's greatest weakness
data.requirements: Genuine love and self-sacrifice
data.effects: Creates powerful protection (Lily's sacrifice for Harry); cannot be overcome by Dark magic
data.limitations: Cannot be forced or faked; requires true sacrifice
data.book_appearances: PS, COS, POA, GOF, OOTF, HBP, DH
data.significance: Lily's love protects Harry; Dumbledore's key teaching; Harry's ultimate weapon against Voldemort
data.key_examples: Lily's sacrificial protection, Harry's protection at Dursleys
data.note: Book 1-7: The most powerful form of magic, Harry's protection from Voldemort
data.tweet_text_ja: 【愛】最も強力な魔法の形態。リリーの自己犠牲的な愛がハリーを守り、ヴォルデモートの呪いを跳ね返しました。作り出すことも偽ることもできず、ヴォルデモートの最大の弱点でした。ダンブルドアの重要な教えであり、ハリーの究極の武器です。

data.description_en: Non-magical person with no wizarding heritage
data.description_ja: 魔法使いの血統を持たない非魔法族
data.characteristics: Cannot see magical buildings or creatures; unaware of wizarding world (usually)
data.requirements: Born without magical ability
data.effects: Live separate from wizarding world; protected by Statute of Secrecy
data.limitations: Cannot perform magic; some can produce magical offspring (Muggle-borns)
data.book_appearances: PS, COS, POA, GOF, OOTF, HBP, DH
data.significance: Dursleys are Muggles; Pure-blood supremacists look down on them; protected by Ministry
data.key_examples: Vernon and Petunia Dursley, Hermione's parents
data.note: Book 1-7: Non-magical person
data.tweet_text_ja: 【マグル】魔法の能力を持たない非魔法族。魔法界の建物や生物を見ることができず、通常は魔法界の存在を知りません。ハリーの親戚ダーズリー一家はマグルです。純血主義者は彼らを見下します。

data.description_en: Magical form of teleportation requiring license and training
data.description_ja: 免許と訓練が必要な魔法の瞬間移動
data.characteristics: Instantaneous travel; requires concentration on Destination, Determination, Deliberation
data.requirements: Must be 17 years old; pass Ministry test; license required
data.effects: Instant transportation from one location to another
data.limitations: Can splinch if done incorrectly; impossible in Hogwarts (anti-Apparition charms); long distances difficult
data.significance: Common adult transportation; Harry learns in Book 6; key escape method in Book 7
data.key_examples: Side-Along Apparition, Apparition lessons, escapes in Book 7
data.note: Book 3-7: Magical teleportation requiring a license
data.tweet_text_ja: 【姿あらわし】17歳以上で免許が必要な魔法の瞬間移動です。失敗すると身体が分離する「ばらけ」が起きます。ホグワーツ内では姿あらわし防止呪文がかけられ、この魔法は使えません。6巻でハリーは訓練を受けました。

data.description_en: Branch of magic that adds properties to objects or creatures
data.description_ja: 物体や生物に特性を付加する魔法の分野
data.characteristics: Core subject at Hogwarts; taught by Professor Flitwick
data.requirements: Required for all students; O.W.L. and N.E.W.T. examinations
data.effects: Enchants objects with new properties; includes levitation, summoning, protection
data.limitations: Requires proper wand movement and pronunciation
data.book_appearances: PS, COS, POA, GOF, OOTF, HBP, DH
data.significance: One of core subjects; includes many useful everyday spells
data.key_examples: Wingardium Leviosa, Accio, Lumos, Protego
data.note: Book 1-7: Type of spell that adds properties to objects or creatures
data.tweet_text_ja: 【呪文学】物体や生物に新しい特性を付加する魔法の分野。フリットウィック先生が教える必修科目で、浮遊術、呼び寄せ呪文など日常的に役立つ呪文が含まれます。正確な杖の動きと発音が必要です。

data.description_en: Branch of magic involving brewing magical mixtures with various effects
data.description_ja: 様々な効果を持つ魔法の調合を作る魔法の分野
data.characteristics: Precise science; requires exact ingredients and timing
data.requirements: Required for all students; O.W.L. and N.E.W.T. examinations
data.effects: Creates potions for healing, transformation, luck, and other purposes
data.limitations: Requires precise measurements and timing; mistakes can be dangerous
data.book_appearances: PS, COS, POA, GOF, OOTF, HBP, DH
data.significance: Taught by Snape then Slughorn; Harry excels in Book 6 with Half-Blood Prince's book
data.key_examples: Polyjuice Potion, Felix Felicis, Wolfsbane Potion
data.note: Book 1-7: Magical mixtures with various effects
data.tweet_text_ja: 【魔法薬学】様々な効果を持つ魔法の調合を作る精密な科学。正確な材料と調合時間が必要で、失敗すると危険です。スネイプ先生（後にスラグホーン先生）が教えます。ポリジュース薬、幸運の薬、脱狼薬などがあります。

data.description_en: Branch of magic focusing on changing the form and appearance of objects
data.description_ja: 物体の形態と外観を変える魔法の分野
data.characteristics: Complex and dangerous if done incorrectly; taught by McGonagall
data.requirements: Required for all students; O.W.L. and N.E.W.T. examinations
data.effects: Transforms objects into other objects; includes Animagus transformation
data.limitations: Cannot create food; permanent changes require great skill
data.book_appearances: PS, COS, POA, GOF, OOTF, HBP, DH
data.significance: One of most complex magical disciplines; McGonagall's specialty
data.key_examples: Turning animals into water goblets, Animagus transformation
data.note: Book 1-7: Branch of magic that focuses on changing objects
data.tweet_text_ja: 【変身術】物体の形態と外観を変える複雑な魔法分野。マクゴナガル先生が教える必修科目で、誤って行うと危険です。動物をゴブレットに変えたり、動物もどきに変身したりします。食べ物は創造できません。最も複雑な魔法分野の一つです。

data.description_en: Complex study of wands, their allegiance, and their relationship with wizards
data.description_ja: 杖、その忠誠心、魔法使いとの関係についての複雑な研究
data.characteristics: The wand chooses the wizard; allegiance can change through defeat
data.requirements: Deep understanding of magical theory
data.effects: Explains wand allegiance, twin cores, and Elder Wand mastery
data.limitations: Not widely understood; subtle and complex rules
data.significance: Critical in Book 7; Harry's understanding saves him from Voldemort
data.key_examples: Harry and Voldemort's twin cores, Elder Wand allegiance
data.note: Book 1,7: The study of wands and their allegiance
data.tweet_text_ja: 【杖の術】杖とその忠誠心、魔法使いとの関係を研究する複雑な学問。杖が魔法使いを選び、決闘での敗北によって忠誠が変わります。ハリーとヴォルデモートの双子の杖、ニワトコの杖の忠誠などを説明します。7巻ではこの理解がハリーを救いました。

data.description_en: Magical ability to extract feelings and memories from another's mind
data.description_ja: 他人の心から感情や記憶を抽出する魔法能力
data.characteristics: Requires eye contact and concentration; difficult to master
data.requirements: Advanced magical training; natural talent helps
data.effects: Reads thoughts, emotions, and memories; can detect lies
data.limitations: Can be blocked by Occlumency; requires focus
data.significance: Snape tries to teach Harry Occlumency to block Voldemort's Legilimency
data.key_examples: Snape and Voldemort are skilled Legilimens
data.note: Book 5-7: The magical ability to extract feelings and memories from another's mind
data.tweet_text_ja: 【開心術】他人の心から思考、感情、記憶を読み取る魔法能力。目を合わせて集中する必要があり、習得は困難です。閉心術で防げます。スネイプとヴォルデモートは熟練した開心術師で、5巻でスネイプはハリーに閉心術を教えようとしました。

data.description_en: Magical defense of the mind against external penetration
data.description_ja: 外部の侵入から心を守る魔法の防御
data.characteristics: Requires clearing mind of emotion; extremely difficult
data.requirements: Advanced training; emotional control essential
data.effects: Blocks Legilimency; protects thoughts and memories
data.limitations: Very difficult to master; Harry struggles with it
data.significance: Snape teaches Harry to block Voldemort; Harry's failure leads to Sirius's death
data.key_examples: Snape's Occlumency lessons with Harry
data.note: Book 5-7: The magical defense against Legilimency
data.tweet_text_ja: 【閉心術】開心術から心を守る魔法の防御。感情を消して心を空にする必要があり、非常に習得困難です。5巻でスネイプがハリーに教えましたが、ハリーは習得できず、失敗がシリウスの死につながりました。感情のコントロールが不可欠です。

data.description_en: Extremely complex charm that conceals a secret within a person's soul
data.description_ja: 秘密を人の魂の中に隠す極めて複雑な呪文
data.characteristics: Hides secret within Secret-Keeper; only they can reveal it
data.requirements: Advanced magic; requires Secret-Keeper
data.effects: Makes location or information invisible to all except those told by Secret-Keeper
data.limitations: Secret-Keeper must be trusted; if they die, all who knew become Secret-Keepers
data.significance: Protected Potters (Peter betrayed them); protects 12 Grimmauld Place
data.key_examples: Godric's Hollow, 12 Grimmauld Place
data.note: Book 3-7: Charm that conceals a secret within a person's soul
data.tweet_text_ja: 【忠誠の術】秘密を秘密の守人の魂の中に隠す極めて複雑な呪文。守人だけが秘密を明かせます。ポッター家を守っていましたがピーターが裏切りました。グリモールド・プレイス12番地も守っています。守人は信頼できる人物である必要があります。

data.description_en: Wizard or witch with purely magical ancestry
data.description_ja: 完全に魔法使いの血統のみを持つ魔女や魔法使い
data.characteristics: No Muggle ancestry; considered superior by blood supremacists; basis for discrimination
data.requirements: Both parents are magical with no known Muggle ancestry
data.effects: Social status among supremacists; no actual magical advantage
data.limitations: Definition is arbitrary; many 'pure-blood' families likely have Muggle ancestry
data.significance: Central to Voldemort's ideology; Malfoys, Blacks, and other families pride themselves on purity
data.key_examples: Malfoy family, Black family, Weasley family
data.note: Book 2-7: Wizard with purely magical ancestry
data.tweet_text_ja: 【純血】完全に魔法使いの血統のみを持つ者。マルフォイ家やブラック家などが純血の誇りを持っています。純血主義者は優位性を主張しますが、実際には魔法能力に差はありません。多くの純血家系も過去にマグルの血が混じっている可能性があります。

data.description_en: Wizard or witch with both magical and Muggle ancestry
data.description_ja: 魔法使いとマグルの両方の血統を持つ魔女や魔法使い
data.characteristics: Mixed magical and Muggle heritage; most common blood status
data.requirements: At least one magical parent and some Muggle ancestry
data.effects: Neither fully accepted by pure-blood supremacists nor discriminated against like Muggle-borns
data.limitations: May face some prejudice from extremists
data.significance: Harry is half-blood; Voldemort is half-blood (ironic given his ideology); Snape called himself 'Half-Blood Prince'
data.key_examples: Harry Potter, Tom Riddle/Voldemort, Severus Snape
data.note: Book 2-7: Wizard with both magical and Muggle ancestry
data.tweet_text_ja: 【半純血（混血）】魔法使いとマグルの両方の血統を持つ者。ハリー、ヴォルデモート、スネイプが該当します。最も一般的な血統で、純血主義者からも完全には受け入れられませんが、マグル生まれほどの差別は受けません。スネイプは自らを「半純血のプリンス」と呼びました。

data.description_en: Witch or wizard born to non-magical parents
data.description_ja: 非魔法族の両親から生まれた魔女や魔法使い
data.characteristics: No known magical ancestry; called 'Mudblood' as a slur; faces severe discrimination from supremacists
data.requirements: Born to two Muggle parents
data.effects: Target of discrimination and persecution; no difference in magical ability
data.limitations: May be unfamiliar with wizarding world customs initially
data.significance: Hermione is Muggle-born; persecuted by Voldemort's regime; proves magical ability is not hereditary
data.key_examples: Hermione Granger, Lily Evans Potter, Colin Creevey
data.note: Book 2-7: Witch or wizard born to Muggle parents
data.tweet_text_ja: 【マグル生まれ】マグルの両親から生まれた魔女や魔法使い。ハーマイオニー、ハリーの母リリーが該当します。純血主義者から「穢れた血」と侮辱され、ヴォルデモート政権下で迫害されました。しかし魔法能力に差はなく、ハーマイオニーは学年で最優秀の生徒でした。

data.description_en: Imprint of a departed soul left upon the earth
data.description_ja: 地上に残された死者の魂の刻印
data.characteristics: Transparent, pearly-white; chose to remain rather than move on
data.requirements: Wizard chooses to become ghost out of fear of death
data.effects: Exist between life and death; cannot physically interact; provide history and guidance
data.limitations: Cannot eat, feel, or truly live; pale imitation of former life
data.book_appearances: PS, COS, POA, GOF, OOTF, HBP, DH
data.significance: Each house has ghost; Nearly Headless Nick, Grey Lady (Helena Ravenclaw), Bloody Baron
data.key_examples: Nearly Headless Nick, Moaning Myrtle, Grey Lady
data.note: Book 1-7: Imprint of a departed soul left upon the earth
